text: Battle enemies along an ambush path, the attacker will have the advantage over the defender.
Battle enemies in a classic land battle map.
Battle enemies in a classic land battle map. Defeat the enemy army or capture and hold the central objective to win.
Battle for points by defeating enemies, capturing objectives and reinforcing your armies against other players in an arena map.
Battle for points by fighting and defeating three other players in an arena map.
Battle enemies in a chokepoint map where a defender has to hold off the attacker.
Battle in a walled settlement where a defender has to hold off the besieging attacker by building barricades and towers.
Battle and survive against waves of enemies by building barricades and towers, reinforcing and upgrading your army.
Battle enemies in an underground map.
Battle in an unwalled settlement where a defender has to hold off the besieging attacker by building barricades and towers.
